steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Mailings' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Create' group, click on the 'Labels' button.
In the 'Envelopes and Labels' dialog box, click on the 'Options' button.
In the 'Label Options' dialog box, select the desired label type and size.
Click on the 'OK' button to close the 'Label Options' dialog box.
In the 'Envelopes and Labels' dialog box, click on the 'New Document' button.
The mailing labels will be generated in a new Word document.
Review and make any necessary adjustments to the mailing labels.
Save and print the mailing labels as needed.
